questions.q: How does monthly invoicing work exactly?
questions.a: You receive one clear invoice every month with all rides. This contains a detailed overview per ride, employee and cost center. All invoices are VAT-compliant and can be exported directly to your accounting system.

questions.q: Can multiple employees use the business account?
questions.a: Yes, you can add unlimited users to your account. Each employee gets their own login credentials and you determine the rights and budgets per user yourself.

questions.q: What happens with a no-show or cancellation?
questions.a: Cancellations up to 2 hours before the scheduled ride are free. For cancellations within 2 hours or no-shows we charge 50% of the ride fare. For contract customers we often apply more flexible conditions.

questions.q: How quickly can you activate a business account?
questions.a: After receiving your application, your account is active within 1 business day. You receive your login details immediately and can book rides right away. For urgent cases we can activate within 2 hours.
Yes, for Business and Corporate packages we offer custom SLAs. Think of guaranteed response times, availability and on-time performance. This is all recorded in your contract.

questions.q: Can we also book international rides?
questions.a: Absolutely. We drive throughout Europe. For rides outside the Benelux we recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance so we can schedule the best driver.
